legacy.description: Permanent Representative of China to the UN Office and other International Organizations in Vienna
legacy.name: Li Song 李松

legacy.full_text: 1/4 At today’s #IAEA BoG meeting, I welcomed H.E. Holger MARTINSEN as new Chair of the Board for the coming year & expressed that China will fully support his work, &work with other Member States to actively participate in the Agency’s affairs in the Vienna Spirit of consensus. https://t.co/1zBUgyFOoW

legacy.description: Permanent Representative of China to the UN Office and other International Organizations in Vienna
legacy.name: Li Song 李松

user_mentions.name: Brazil at the IAEA and the PrepCom-CTBTO

legacy.full_text: 2/4 I thanked the outgoing BoG Chair, H.E. Ivo ŠRÁMEK @CZMissionVienna, & Vice Chairs, H.E. Carlos Sérgio SOBRAL DUARTE @AieaBrasil, & H.E. Eoin O’LEARY @IrlEmbVienna, for their contributions to the development of @iaeaorg over the past year. https://t.co/DcimVZkuPx

legacy.description: Permanent Representative of China to the UN Office and other International Organizations in Vienna
legacy.name: Li Song 李松

legacy.full_text: 3/4 China welcomes Algeria, Armenia, Bangladesh, Burkina Faso, Ecuador, Indonesia, the Republic of Korea, the Netherlands, Spain, and Ukraine to serve on the Board of Governors for 2023-2025. https://t.co/plzBCVUZ3B

legacy.description: Permanent Representative of China to the UN Office and other International Organizations in Vienna
legacy.name: Li Song 李松

legacy.full_text: 3/4 China welcomes Algeria, Armenia, Bangladesh, Burkina Faso, Ecuador, Indonesia, the Republic of Korea, the Netherlands, Spain, and Ukraine to serve on the Board of Governors for 2023-2025. https://t.co/AAL6d36v8O

legacy.description: Permanent Representative of China to the UN Office and other International Organizations in Vienna
legacy.name: Li Song 李松

user_mentions.name: Permanent Mission of Bulgaria in Vienna

legacy.full_text: 4/4 I am looking forward to strengthening cooperation with the Chair, @ARGenViena Ambassador, H.E. Holger MARTINSEN, and the Vice Chairs, Dutch Amb. @peterpotman & @BGMissionVienna Amb. Emilia Kraleva, as well as other Member States in the follow-up work of the Board. https://t.co/F1ODGXY1lD

legacy.full_text:
1/7 At today’s #IAEA GC session, H.E. Amb LI Song stressed the need to continue to advance an open, transparent, inclusive and sustainable intergovernmental process.
See the following link for full remarks: https://t.co/cUX8le9cZL https://t.co/loUid78Vku

legacy.description: Director General of the @IAEAorg International Atomic Energy Agency
legacy.name: Rafael MarianoGrossi

legacy.full_text: Excellent meeting with 🇨🇳 Zheng Mingguang, IAEA's Standing Advisory Group on Nuclear Energy Chairperson. Grateful for SAGNE’s invaluable advice on nuclear energy. Meaningful exchange on importance achieving #Atoms4NetZero and new developments in the nuclear sector. https://t.co/QEJFCbYVmB

legacy.description: Director General of the @IAEAorg International Atomic Energy Agency
legacy.name: Rafael MarianoGrossi

legacy.full_text: Signed agreement w/ #China Atomic Energy Authority to enhance collaboration in education & training in emergency preparedness and response. A productive exchange w/ 🇨🇳 CAEA Vice Chairman Liu Jing at #IAEAGC underscored importance of strong relationship between @IAEAorg & #China. https://t.co/K5ZW1S5A2n

legacy.full_text: 1/3 CAEA Vice Chairman Mr. Liu Jing met w/ DG @rafaelmgrossi at the sideline of the 67th #IAEAGC. Liu said China highly values the coop. w/ the Agency from the strategic perspective of safeguarding world peace &security, and promoting the achievement of the SDGs. https://t.co/QL9GEMzART

legacy.description: Welcome to the official twitter account of the Permanent Mission of China to the United Nations and other International Organizations in Vienna.
legacy.name: Permanent Mission of China in Vienna

legacy.full_text: 1/3🇨🇳released a white paper titled "A Global Community of Shared Future: China's Proposals and Actions" which systemically outlines the core components of the thinking behind President Xi’s vision of building a community w/ a shared future for mankind & how it has been practiced. https://t.co/GibbQDNmwa

legacy.description: Permanent Representative of China to the UN Office and other International Organizations in Vienna
legacy.name: Li Song 李松

legacy.full_text: 1/4 My great pleasure to co-host the National Day Reception for celebrating the 74th anniversary of the founding of the People’s Republic of China together with Chinese Amb. to Austria @EmbQiMei. Thank you all for attending the reception! https://t.co/qWi5dljrU4

legacy.description: Permanent Representative of China to the UN Office and other International Organizations in Vienna
legacy.name: Li Song 李松

legacy.full_text: 3/4 I, together w/ my team, stand ready to work w/ permanent missions & colleagues to actively promote a greater role of “G77+China”in Vienna & enhance cooperation between int’l organizations & China, thereby making China’s contribution to multilateral affairs in various fields. https://t.co/TNe6lsDO42

legacy.full_text: 1/3 Vice Foreign Minister Ma Zhaoxu met w/ @IAEAorg DG Grossi in New York at the latter's request and clarified China's position on Japan's discharge of nuclear-contaminated water into the sea. https://t.co/cxEGvZ2Ekr https://t.co/9yvParYMgL

legacy.description: Permanent Representative of China to the UN Office and other International Organizations in Vienna
legacy.name: Li Song 李松

user_mentions.name: Permanent Mission of Hungary in Vienna

legacy.full_text: Pleased to welcome H.E. Mr. Ferenc DANCS @Dr_Ferenc_Dancs, P.R. of Hungary @humissionviu in my mission, and had a wide exchange of views on issues of mutual interest. Looking forward to strengthening communication & cooperation with Your Excellency. https://t.co/aWGqHidHcK

legacy.description: Permanent Representative of China to the UN Office and other International Organizations in Vienna
legacy.name: Li Song 李松

legacy.full_text: Glad to meet with H.E. Amb. @peterpotman, P.R. of Netherlands, in my mission, to recall our old days in Geneva during #CTBT negotiation. Looking forward to our new journey in Vienna. https://t.co/ZGE3druI2O

legacy.description: Permanent Representative of China to the UN Office and other International Organizations in Vienna
legacy.name: Li Song 李松

legacy.full_text: Glad to meet with H.E. Amb. Claudia Vieira Santos, P.R. of Brazil to IAEA and CTBTO. Guided by our long-term strategic partnership, as well as the spirit of the recent BRICS Summit, I’m looking forward to coordinating closely with Your Excellency. https://t.co/HRnBvIS1T0
